name: Shweet Shlurp
description:
Lick the orbs in your favourite flavour, but avoid the others. Avoid the falling obstacles.

At least 1 gamepad is required to play in multiplayer mode.

Team Members:

  • Julia "Mourlie" Daxenbichler
  • Lukas "Mr-Rossi" Rosenberger

Additional Credits:

  • Background Music "Jaunty Gumption" by Kevin MacLeod  (incompetech.com)
